task.title: Post the Payroll
task.shortdesc: The Finish step posts the pay data from the temporary batch tables to the employee check history.

context.p: NAVIGATION: MenuAdministrationPayroll ProcessingPayroll Gatewayselect a pay group

step.cmd: From the Payroll Overview page, select Finish payroll. The payroll information from the temporary batch tables is posted to the employee check history.
Review the reports generated when the payroll is posted.
